tables.name: accounts
tables.def: CREATE TABLE "accounts" ("account_id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "created_at" TEXT NOT NULL, "password" TEXT NOT NULL, "email" TEXT NOT NULL, "login_tokens" TEXT NULL, "status" TEXT NULL, "updated_at" TEXT NOT NULL, "username" TEXT NOT NULL, "account_type" TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: messages

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms (room_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def: CREATE TABLE "messages" ("message_id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "room_id" INTEGER REFERENCES rooms(room_id), "msg" TEXT NOT NULL, "account_id" INTEGER REFERENCES accounts(account_id), "updated_at" TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: permissions
tables.def: CREATE TABLE "permissions" ("permission_id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "updated_at" TEXT NOT NULL, "roles" TEXT NOT NULL, "level" TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: room_participants

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms (room_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def: CREATE TABLE "room_participants" ("room_id" INTEGER REFERENCES rooms(room_id), "account_id" INTEGER REFERENCES accounts(account_id))

tables.name: rooms
tables.def: CREATE TABLE "rooms" ("room_id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "updated_at" TEXT NOT NULL, "topic" TEXT NULL, "name" TEXT NOT NULL, "last_message" TEXT NULL)

tables.name: user_characters

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (character_account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def: CREATE TABLE "user_characters" ("account_id" INTEGER REFERENCES accounts(account_id), "character_account_id" INTEGER REFERENCES accounts(account_id), "index" INTEGER NOT NULL)

tables.name: user_permissions

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions (permission_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def: CREATE TABLE "user_permissions" ("account_id" INTEGER REFERENCES accounts(account_id), "permission_id" INTEGER REFERENCES permissions(permission_id))

relations.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms (room_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms (room_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (character_account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions (permission_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (account_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
